titleStmt.title: A dialogue between claret & darby-ale a poem, considered in an accidental conversation between two gentlemen.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Edward, 1667-1731.
Ames, Richard, d. 1693.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Also attributed to Richard Ames. cf. NUC pre-1956.
